ShortDescription.Value: Thai Localization Mod for Cities: Skylines II

Publish.LongDescription:
# Thai Localization Mod for Cities: Skylines II
This Thai community translator version (Bata version). Using method to place new localization file th-TH.loc into your game.
Feedback or Join us at https://discord.gg/RGzX9YWBYS
https://www.facebook.com/groups/CitiesSkylinesThailand
Manual Activate: Open game goto menu "Paradox Mods" > Select "Playsets" > Choose current "Activated" playset > Scroll to "Thai Localization" and toggle enabled in the rightside.
## Translator * Bammcool * Bossthumb * Ca7amel * Landkarte * N7C * Mazokie * Solutiongamer
## Advice * Bell * Chamëleon TBN * PanlopPalms * Simscolony
## Special Thank * BSTech for Loc converter tool. * Den for injection code mod.
Publish.ChangeLog: * Hotfix support game version 1.1.6f1 (3 July 2024). * Add new 55 string. * Adjust some translation.
